hooks.command: voice_flag="$HOME/.claude/voice-enabled"; ring_flag="$HOME/.claude/ring-enabled"; if [ -f "$ring_flag" ]; then pkill -f 'say' 2>/dev/null; nohup bash -c 'say "Claude Code Done"' >/dev/null 2>&1 & elif [ -f "$voice_flag" ]; then transcript_path=$(cat | jq -r '.transcript_path'); pkill -f 'say' 2>/dev/null; nohup bash -c 'tail -1 "'$transcript_path'" | jq -r ".message.content[0].text // empty" | say' >/dev/null 2>&1 & fi
